title: Materials for the Boistfort to Chehalis Fiber Project
description: The Public Utility District No. 1 of Lewis County (District) requires fiber vaults, fiber conduit, OFDC-C, 2C-OFDC Feeder cables, Splitter cabinets and splitter cartridges for the Boistfort to Chehalis area in Washington State with delivery in accordance with the IFB’s exhibits.This project will utilize the community connect grant funds therefore bidders must comply with Buy American requirements promulgated at 7 CFR 1787 to be considered responsive and responsible.Bids will be received up to the due date and time and then be publicly opened and read out loud at the District’s Headquarters Auditorium Conference room. Deliver your bids to: Public Utility District No. 1 of Lewis County To the attention of Purchasing and Contracting 23-024-IFB | Boistfort to Chehalis Fiber Project Materials 321 N.W. Pacific Avenue Chehalis, Washington 98532This solicitation, including instructions, specifications, reference documents, and addenda, is electronically available at https://www.lcpud.org/bids.

title: Materials for the Elbe to Morton Fiber Project
description: The Public Utility District No. 1 of Lewis County (District) requires fiber vaults, fiber conduit, OFDC-C, 2C-OFDC Feeder cables, Splitter cabinets and splitter cartridges for the Elbe to Morton area in Washington State with delivery in accordance with the IFB’s exhibits.This project will utilize the community connect grant funds therefore bidders must comply with Buy American requirements promulgated at 7 CFR 1787 to be considered responsive and responsible.Bids will be received up to the due date and time and then be publicly opened and read out loud at the District’s Headquarters Auditorium Conference room. Deliver your bids to: Public Utility District No. 1 of Lewis County To the attention of Purchasing and Contracting 23-027-IFB Elbe to Morton Fiber Project Materials 321 N.W. Pacific Avenue Chehalis, Washington 98532This solicitation, including instructions, specifications, reference documents, and addenda, is electronically available at https://www.lcpud.org/bids.

title: AUDIT SERVICES
description: AUDIT SERVICES – REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL Tillamook Lightwave, IGA, is requesting proposals for the services of a Certified Public Accounting firm to conduct the Annual Financial Report and Single Audit (if required) of the Agency. The appointment will be for an initial three (3) year period beginning with the audit year 2022 and may be extended for an additional two (2) years. Information concerning the Request for Proposal may be obtained on the website at https://www.tpud.org/rfp Proposals due 3:00 pm, March 30, 2023

title: Randle & Salkum Substation Switches & Motor Operating Devices
description: Public Utility District No. 1 of Lewis County (DISTRICT) requires Switches & Motor Operating Devices for the Randle & Salkum Substations, with delivery in accordance with the IFB’s exhibits.SEALED Responses will be accepted at the Public Utility District No. 1 of Lewis County (District). Clearly identify your package as follows: Public Utility District No. 1 of Lewis County 23-025-IFB | Bid for Switches for Randle and Salkum Substations 321 N.W. Pacific Avenue Chehalis, Washington 98532

title: Randle & Salkum Control Enclosures
description: Scope of Work: Contractor shall provide labor, equipment, materials for fabrication and delivery of two Prefabricated Control Enclosures in accordance with the design specifications listed in Exhibit A. Requirements. Bids must be for the items and/or alternates as specified by the Contract Documents.

title: 2023-2026 Tree Trimming & Vegetation Management
description: INVITATION FOR BIDS2023-2026 Tree Trimming & Vegetation Management Solicitation No.: 23-014-PWB Responses Due: 2:00 p.m., March 30th, 2023The Public Utility District No. 1 of Lewis County (District) requires a District “Fa” Pre-Qualified Contractor to provide labor, equipment, and materials to prune, cut, treat and dispose of trees and brush along, and under Utility communications, service, distribution, and transmission lines, throughout Lewis County PUD service territory.Submittal: Bids will be received up to the due date and time at: Public Utility District No. 1 of Lewis County To the attention of Purchasing and Contracting 321 N.W. Pacific Avenue Chehalis, Washington 98532Proposal Documents: This solicitation, including instructions, specifications, reference documents, and addenda, is electronically available at https://www.lcpud.org/bidsRequests for Information: Email Marc Ripley at marcr@lcpud.org.

title: NWCPUD Transformer Purchase
description: Northern Wasco County People’s Utility District (hereinafter called “District”) issues this Request for Proposals soliciting the purchase of transformers. Bid documents can be found on the NWCPUD website. All documents and changes will be uploaded to the NWCPUD website and is the responsibility of the Vendor to periodically check the website for updated bid documents. https://www.nwascopud.org/operations-safety/bids/
